drupalNodeEvent.title: Finding Success in an Age of Crisis

field_speakers.processed: State Counselor Zhu Guangyao, HK Secretary for Treasury Christopher Hui, APCO Asia Chair James McGregor, Sinovation founder Kai-Fu Lee, former Michigan Governor Rick Snyder, USCBC President Craig Allen, PAG CEO Shan Weijian, Wanxiang USA President Pin NI, 21st Century China Chair Susan Shirk, Center for U.S.-China Relations Director Orville Schell, Ambassador Stapleton Roy, SUPChina founder Anla Cheng, Ogilvy PR Asia Chair Scott Kronick, and more

field_description.processed: Please join this powerful group of business experts, government officials, and thought leaders, who will come together to provide needed context and the pragmatic thinking required to re-start the US-China dialogue. At a time of heightened US-China tension and talk of a decoupled world, our speakers will offer business strategies for dealing with new and growing challenges. This frank and open dialogue is more important than ever.
